title: Determine Sales Taxability of a Service
description: A consulting firm is expanding to a new state and needs to know if its services are subject to sales tax there.

tasks.description: Identify the specific type of consulting service being offered.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the nature of the service.

tasks.description: Research the sales tax laws of the new state regarding the taxability of services.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the state's statutes and regulations on service taxability.

tasks.description: Advise the client on whether they need to collect sales tax on their services in the new state.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the consulting services are not taxable in that state and advises the client.
